case.title: Movies Tonight? - 37 (Queens)
case.text:
I had a long day, and dont want to stay home but dont want to go to the city, anyone else feeling this way? I was thinking maybe we can catch a movie in Kew Gardens/Forest Hills area.
Alittle about me im 5'2, blonde, good personality, single no kids.
You single cute, good personality.
If you think we'd be a fit please send me an email telling me about yourself.
